author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-3305: remove useless serialization from ConnectionCosts, add codec header

author: stsp
msg: Fix issue #4059 (can't commit when copy-op-root and copied-along grandchild
(svn_client__harvest_committables): For copied nodes, use the root of the
copied subtree as dangling parent, rather than the immediate parent.
This prevents us from tripping over the fact that immediate parent nodes
of commit targets located within a copied subtree might not appear in
the list of committables. Only op-roots of copies appear in this list.

author: stsp
msg: Tweak a private libsvn_wc node API so that libsvn_client can use it to find
the root of a copied subtree in the working copy, given some copied node
This new feature isn't used yet so there is no functional change.
(svn_wc__internal_get_origin): Add COPY_ROOT_ABSPATH output param here, too.
This function was already scanning the value from the DB for local use.
(svn_wc__node_get_origin): Pass through the new COPY_ROOT_ABSPATH parameter.
NULL for the new output parameter.
